pages.page: inReach SE Size (incl. antenna) 149 mm x 62 mm x 26 mm Weight 190 g Impact-Resistant Mil-STD-810F Operating Temp. -20° C to +60° C Ingress Protection (IP) Rating IP67 Dust tight & waterproof; standard submersion to 1 m for 30 min Battery Internal lithium polymer Battery Life 100 hours (tracking every 10 minutes) GPS Fix +/- 5 m Lat, long, altitude, speed, direction Coverage 100% global Display Integrated colour screen Keyboard Virtual keyboard with predictive text Speaker Integrated for audible alerts SOS SOS button lock SOS can be cancelled Compatible Devices Pairs via Bluetooth with Android and iOS smartphones and tablets
